00068 class RONet {
00069 public:
00071     RONet() ;
00072 
00073 
00075     virtual ~RONet() ;
00076 
00077 
00079 
00080 
00081     /* @brief Adds a read edge to the network
00082      *
00083      * If the edge is already known (another one with the same id exists),
00084      *  an error is generated and given to msg-error-handler. The edge
00085      *  is deleted in this case and false is returned.
00086      *
00087      * @param[in] edge The edge to add
00088      * @return Whether the edge was added (if not, it was deleted, too)
00089      */
00090     virtual bool addEdge(ROEdge* edge) ;
00091 
00092 
00102     ROEdge* getEdge(const std::string& name) const {
00103         return myEdges.get(name);
00104     }
00105 
00106 
00107     /* @brief Adds a read node to the network
00108      *
00109      * If the node is already known (another one with the same id exists),
00110      *  an error is generated and given to msg-error-handler. The node
00111      *  is deleted in this case
00112      *
00113      * @param[in] node The node to add
00114      */
00115     void addNode(RONode* node) ;
00116 
00117 
00124     RONode* getNode(const std::string& id) const {
00125         return myNodes.get(id);
00126     }
00128 
00129 
00130 
00132 
00133 
00134     /* @brief Adds a read vehicle type definition to the network
00135      *
00136      * If the vehicle type definition is already known (another one with
00137      *  the same id exists), false is returned, and the vehicle type
00138      *  is deleted.
00139      *
00140      * @param[in] def The vehicle type to add
00141      * @return Whether the vehicle type could be added
00142      */
00143     virtual bool addVehicleType(SUMOVTypeParameter* type) ;
00144 
00145 
00158     SUMOVTypeParameter* getVehicleTypeSecure(const std::string& id) ;
00159 
00160 
00161     /* @brief Adds a route definition to the network
00162      *
00163      * If the route definition is already known (another one with
00164      *  the same id exists), false is returned, but the route definition
00165      *  is not deleted.
00166      *
00167      * @param[in] def The route definition to add
00168      * @return Whether the route definition could be added
00169      * @todo Rename myRoutes to myRouteDefinitions
00170      */
00171     bool addRouteDef(RORouteDef* def) ;
00172 
00173 
00181     RORouteDef* getRouteDef(const std::string& name) const {
00182         return myRoutes.get(name);
00183     }
00184 
00185 
00186     /* @brief Adds a vehicle to the network
00187      *
00188      * If the vehicle is already known (another one with the same id
00189      *  exists), false is returned, but the vehicle is not deleted.
00190      *
00191      * Otherwise, the number of loaded routes ("myReadRouteNo") is increased.
00192      *
00193      * @param[in] id The id of the vehicle to add
00194      * @param[in] veh The vehicle to add
00195      * @return Whether the vehicle could be added
00196      */
00197     virtual bool addVehicle(const std::string& id, ROVehicle* veh) ;
00198     // @}
